title: PowerArchiver 2012 13.02.02
description:
PowerArchiver contains all the basic features you would expect from a compression program / archive utility - you can read and extract from many different formats and you can also create archives in many different formats, including 7-Zip which is one of the best compression formats currently used. What makes PowerArchiver different from many similar utilities is the wealth of advanced features it has. Simply put, PowerArchiver is one of the most innovative utilities of its kind and many features you now take for granted in a compression utility were first offered in PowerArchiver.

Key features
Ã‚Â· Complete built-in support (including creating archives and adding files) for ZIP, CAB, LHA (LZH), TAR, TAR.GZ, TAR.BZ2 and BH (BlakHole) files, and built-in support for reading and extracting many other file formats: RAR, ARJ, ARC, ACE, ZOO, GZ and BZIP2
Ã‚Â· Built-in support for XXE and UUE encoded files
Ã‚Â· Many powerful archive operations (including: renaming files in archive, spanning archives, testing archives, viewing and writing comments, installing archives, and checking archives for viruses)
Ã‚Â· Internal viewer that supports TXT, RTF, BMP, ICO, WMF, EMF, GIF and JPG (JPEG) files
Ã‚Â· Skinnable toolbar
Ã‚Â· Drag and Drop from/to Windows Explorer and the Desktop
Ã‚Â· Two ways of viewing archives (Classic - all files in the same listing; Explorer - browsing through an archive like folders in Windows Explorer)
Ã‚Â· Creating powerful ZIP, RAR, ARJ, LHA and BH self-extracting archives
Ã‚Â· Complete integration with Windows (extracting archives and creating archives directly from Windows Explorer using powerful "Explorer Shell Extensions")
Ã‚Â· Viewing files in all view styles, including "as a Web page"
Ã‚Â· Converting between file formats (for example: changing a ZIP archive to CAB archive, or LHA archive to ZIP archive)
Ã‚Â· Tool for repairing corrupted ZIP archives
Ã‚Â· Tool for extracting multiple archives at once
Ã‚Â· Tool for creating backup scripts and running automated backups
Ã‚Â· Auto Update to automatically download and install new versions of PowerArchiver
Ã‚Â· Batch Zip function to create multiple different archives at once
Ã‚Â· Favorite Folders to quickly locate archives
Ã‚Â· Printing file list to printer, or exporting file list to HTML or TXT files
Ã‚Â· Powerful help in HTML and a tutorial with pictures for beginners
Ã‚Â· Many, many other useful and powerful features
